original_text: He judged the cause of the poor and needy; then it was well with him: was not this to know me? saith the Lord.
korean_text: 그는 가난한 자와 궁핍한 자를 변호하고 형통하였나니 이것이 나를 앎이 아니냐 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: He judged the cause of the poor and needy
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 가난한 자와 궁핍한 자의 송사를 공의로 판단하였으며

sentences.original_text: then it was well with him
was not this to know me?
